title: Workshop on Designing Online Distance Education Growth Models: Strategy Development for Language Education Applications

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and experience using online learning tools
context.additional_context: Strengthening Capabilities to Design Online Learning Models Applicable to Language Education Courses for Professionals in Medical/Legal/Technical Fields

learning_goals: Participants can develop institution-specific educational strategies using an online education growth model analysis framework.
Participants can propose three+ language lesson designs that promote learner interaction using real-time video conferencing tools.
Participants can measure the effectiveness of developed educational models through project-based assessments using self-assessment tools.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
